name: Classic Black Tee
creator: Aether & Velvet
details:
Fabric & Materials:
- 100% Cotton
- Soft, breathable fabric
- Pre-shrunk to maintain shape and fit
- Screen printed design for a high-quality finish

Design Features:
- Classic black color
- Crew neck design
- Short sleeves for a relaxed fit
- High-quality band graphic print
- Reinforced stitching for durability

Wash Instructions:
- Machine wash cold
- Wash with like colors
- Do not tumble dry
- Inside out for best print care
- Do not bleach
- Do not dry clean
- Do not iron over the graphic

NOTE: Size charts are for general reference. The fit may vary depending on construction, materials, and manufacturer. Sizing may also vary between and within brands.
